ygData.subject: Re: Training points into research
ygData.msgSnippet: 1 point is all that it will permit you to train.  but on the up side you start out at the feeble skill level. Edywen Xegony ... From: MAD Iguana
ygData.messageBody:
1 point is all that it will permit you to train. but on the up side you
start out at the feeble skill level.

Edywen
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 1:50 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Training points into research


> From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>
> I am currently lvl 15 and since I will be getting research soon I was
